summary: An archaeological expedition brings back to London the coffin of an Egyptian queen known for her magical powers. Her spirit returns in the form of a young girl and strange things start to happen.
cast: Andrew Keir|Valerie Leon|James Villiers|Hugh Burden|George Coulouris|Mark Edwards|Rosalie Crutchley|Aubrey Morris|David Markham|Joan Young|James Cossins|David Jackson|Jonathan Burn|Graham James|Tamara Ustinov|Penelope Holt|Angela Ginders|Tex Fuller|Luis Madina|Omar Amoodi|Abdul Kader|Oscar Charles|Ahmed Osman|Soltan Lalani|Saad Ghazi|Sunbronze Danny Boy|Harry Fielder|Olive Gregg
title: Sangre en la tumba de la momia
